articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Iranian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mongolian PM
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Noroviin Altankhuyag on his appointment as prime minister of Mongolia. 
					 Choe wished the Mongolian prime minister success in his work for development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would strengthen in various fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Cuban FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Cuban FM
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of greeting to his Cuban counterpart Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					 The message expressed full support and solidarity with the Cuban government and people in their drive to defend the gains of the revolution and successfully build socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Brazilian Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Brazilian Party 
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from National Chairman Renato Ravello and International Secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party on August 18.
					 The message said that they received a talk he had with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on July 26, 2012 and extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The brave and fine Korean people will study the work on carrying forward the patriotic stand of President Kim Il Sung who liberated Korea and founded the DPRK, and leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the message said, adding:
					
					 It was recognized in the struggle for socialism in the 20th century, especially in the developing countries that patriotism constitutes an important factor in national liberation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il always valued the national sovereignty and the defence of the country.
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party thinks that the experience gained by the DPRK in successfully settling the issues arising in building socialism and issues concerning patriotism will serve as guidelines in building a new society in Brazil in the 21st century.
					
					 We recognize that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Brazilian Communist Party share the view of patriotism from the viewpoint of the revolutionary theory in the present times.
					
					 The patriotic struggle of the Brazilian communists is the just one for the national and social liberation of the Brazilian people.
					
					 The message extended revolutionary regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Brasilia Federal District Govt. of Brazil
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Brasilia Federal District Govt. of Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Brasilia Federal District Government of Brazil presented a gift to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Raad Massouh, director of the medium enterprises and economic cooperation department of the Brasilia Federal District Government handed over the gift to DPRK Ambassador to Brazil Ri Hwa Gun on August 17.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the Military Attaches Corps here on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They were handed over to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Friday by Iranian Military Attache Hassan Reza Husseini who is the doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Arrive in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Arrive in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- More than 10 000 youth delegates to the celebrations of Youth Day arrived in Pyongyang on Aug. 23 and 24. They are servicepersons, workers, farmers and scientists from across the country.
					 Before their departure they laid floral baskets and bouquets before statues of President Kim Il Sung and smiling portraits of peerlessly great persons and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At terminals of railway stations and parking lots in various places many people, including service personnel and students, heartily sent them off, putting garlands around their necks and presenting bouquets to them.
					
					 At way-stops, cities and counties their trains and buses passed through, local people congratulated the delegates.
					
					 Upon their arrival in Pyongyang Pyongyang citizens warmly greeted them along the route.
					
					 When they entered their lodgings April 25 Hotel, its officials and employees warmly greeted them, waving bouquets.

articles.title: Italian Businessman Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Italian Businessman Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited Mangyongdae.
					 He went to President Kim Il Sung's birthplace at Mangyongdae and looked round historic relics, being briefed on the history of the house.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the chairman said that he visited the birthplace of the President whenever he visited the DPRK.
					
					 He noted that he had the honor of being received by the President several times.
					
					 "The smiling image of the President is always kept in my mind," he said, and went on:
					
					 "The President turned the DPRK into an invincible power and exalted the country's sovereignty and the nation's dignity. The new history of the Korean nation was possible thanks to the President.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The friendship delegation of the Service Department of Diplomatic Corps of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Vietnam led by Director General Nguyen Van Hoa and foreign delegations and delegates who took part in the International Academic Symposium of Kim Il Sung University left here for home on Friday.  
					 Among them were the delegations of Liaoning, Jilin and People's universities of China and delegates of Qinghua University of China and Humboldt University of Germany.
					
					 Leaving earlier were the delegation of Yanbian University of China and the delegate of the Academy of Social Sciences of China.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the occasion of August 25 when Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 This is a great event which powerfully demonstrated the unshakable will of all service personnel and people to accomplish the cause of the sun generation after generation, holding the commanders of Mt. Paektu in high esteem forever, and translated into a reality the greatest desire of the service personnel of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 The statues depict Kim Il Sung with his hands on his waist and his face beaming with a broad smile and smiling Kim Jong Il visualizing a bright future of the new century and wishing Songun Korea eternal prosperity.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Chol Hae and O Kuk Ryol, and senior officials of the Ministry, servicepersons, military families, officials and employees of organs that rendered devoted services for the erection of the statues and people in the city.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by senior party and army officials. 
					
					 When they were unveiled, the statues of the great Generalissimos, ever-victorious banner and symbol of victory and glory of Songun Korea, shed their brilliant rays.
					
					 That moment the crowds broke into rousing cheers of "hurrah," a gun salute was fired and balloons soared into the sky, beautifully decorating it.
					
					 A floral basket bearing the august name of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un was laid before the statues.
					
					 Also placed before them were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK National Defence Commission and a floral basket in the joint name of the General Staff and the General Political Bureau of the KPA and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Hundreds of floral baskets were laid there in the names of the KPA units and sub-units of different levels, military academies and units honored with the field guidance given by the commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 All the participants paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made an unveiling speech.
					
					 He referred to the immortal exploits the great Generalissimos performed by turning the DPRK into a world-class military power having matchless military capability and enabling it to demonstrate its might as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 The great event of holding an unveiling ceremony of their statues is the brilliant fruition of the noblest sense of moral obligation and wise leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 He paid highest tribute to the Generalissimos, reflecting the boundless reverence of all the service personnel and people of the country for them and extended the highest glory and warmest thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un for having opened a new chapter in carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Friday to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.  
					 Present there were senior officials of the party, army and state including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and Hyon Yong Chol, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and working people in the city.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report.
					
					 He said: The field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il to Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, 1960 was a solemn declaration that heralded the brilliant succession to the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats before the era and revolution, the country and humankind by leading the country to weather grim difficulties of history with his outstanding idea and extraordinary leadership for half a century since he embarked on the road of the Songun revolution, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He adopted the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism with his far-sighted wisdom and rare insight at a time when the Korean revolution was facing the worst difficulties. And he embodied it in all fields.
					
					 He made sure that party work and activities were oriented to the implementation of the Songun revolutionary line, the trait of giving importance to arms and military affairs prevailed throughout society and state machinery of Korean style with the National Defence Commission as its pivot was established. This was an event of special mention as it provided a sure political and institutional guarantee for enforcing the Songun politics.
					
					 He trained the KPA as invincible revolutionary armed forces and made the country emerge a world-level military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the KPA has grown to be the most elite powerful revolutionary army with the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the DPRK's national defence industry developed into a powerful defence industry fully capable of producing any cutting-edge weapon.
					
					 He placed the unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks on the level of single-minded unity of the leader, the party, the army and the people by turning the KPA into the ranks of comrades who share destiny with the Supreme Commander and achieving the perfect unity of the army and people in thinking and fighting spirit. 
					
					 The single-minded unity has become steel-strong at a time when the unity between the officers and men and combination of military and political affairs have become a shining reality in the whole army and the trait of army-people unity is given full play throughout society. This is the greatest wealth and the highest pride that can never be bartered for anything.
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled a grandiose blueprint for building a thriving nation during the Arduous March, forced march and led the KPA to make a breakthrough on major fronts of socialist construction and all the people to learn from the revolutionary soldier spirit. This made a high-pitched drive for great innovations and a great leap forward sweep throughout the country.
					
					 Marvelous events unprecedented in the 5 000-year-long history of the nation took place one after another thanks to his forced marches for field guidance, an indication of his love for the country and its people.
					
					 Satellites were put into the space, CNC-based machine tools mass-produced, Juche-oriented production systems established, monumental edifices, icons of the 21st century, appeared in different parts of the country and a new heyday was ushered in the construction of socialist culture. 
					
					 His Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics resulted in the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration based on the idea of "By our nation itself" and the opening of a new phase in the country's reunification movement. They, at the same time, put strong spurs to firmly defending the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and promoting the human cause of independence.
					
					 The reporter said that the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche is making steady advance without an inch of deflection thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We should build a thriving socialist nation on this land at an early date and achieve the independent reunification of the country and final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche by upholding the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un with loyalty.
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people should hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the center of the unity and leadership, resolutely protect him politically and ideologically and with their lives in any adversity and unite close around him.
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces are fully ready to fight decisive battles after occupying battle positions to cope with the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers' reckless maneuvers to provoke a war of aggression.
					
					 Upon receiving a combat order given by the Supreme Commander, the army and the people of the DPRK are firmly determined to fulfill it. If the enemy fires even a single shell at the territory of the DPRK, they will not miss the golden opportunity but deal prompt deadly blows at the enemy and wage a sacred war for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building DPRK into Military Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building DPRK into Military Power
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, Juche 49 (1960), which signaled the beginning of the Songun (military-first) leadership in the DPRK.
					 In his Songun leadership, he always put military affairs above anything else under any circumstances.
					
					 He constantly paid great efforts to building the KPA into an army serving the leader and the Workers' Party of Korea and playing a big role in accomplishing the cause of Juche and building a prosperous nation.
					
					 KPA has now turned into a main driving force in speeding up the development of the country.
					
					 He steadfastly took to the principle of self-reliance in bolstering up the nation's defence capabilities, thus further developing the local defense industry, which was founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He made ceaseless inspection tours of KPA units.
					
					 It is one of his greatest feats in the Songun leadership that he turned the DPRK into a nuclear state.
					
					 DPRK's stand of reacting to the U.S. tough policy with tougher one is based on its strong military power. 
					
					 His Songun leadership has now been creditably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under Kim Jong Un's leadership, DPRK's military might is growing stronger.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodgings of Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodgings of Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the lodgings of delegates to celebrations of Youth Day on Friday.
					 Among them were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Mun Kyong Dok and officials concerned of party and working people's bodies.
					
					 They warmly congratulated the delegates on taking part in celebrations, an auspicious event which will hold a special page in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the country, thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Being briefed on the feats performed by delegates by displaying wisdom and bravery in defending the country and building a thriving nation, they spoke highly of them.
					
					 They also met the members of the delegations of young Koreans in Japan and China to encourage them who are making contributions to achieving prosperity of the country and strengthening the movement of overseas Koreans.
					
					 They appealed to the delegates to always remember the profound loving care shown by Kim Jong Un, who placed great trust in them, saying that the building of a thriving nation will be accelerated by the vigorous drive of the youth.
					
					 They also called upon the delegates to fully prepare themselves to be successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche who creditably inherit the traditions of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the Party.

articles.title: Torchlight Relay Racers Arrive in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Torchlight Relay Racers Arrive in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Members of young vanguard participating in the torchlight relay race arrived in Pyongyang Friday to mark Youth Day. They were full of the pledge to give steady continuity to the march toward Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Holding aloft the torchlight of revolution that was kindled on Mt. Paektu and Osong, the young people passed through every nook and corner of the country. They finally entered the Thongil Street of Pyongyang Friday.
					
					 Service persons, citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children lined up along the streets to warmly greet them.
					
					 Arriving first at the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower were relay racers of the Korean People's Army.    Then followed young vanguard relay racers.
					
					 The chiefs of the ranks of service persons and young vanguard made reports on their arrivals.
					
					 Jong Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth league, warmly congratulated them. 
					
					 The race strikingly displayed steadfast will of the youth of the DPRK to uphold Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader of the party and the revolution and dynamically advance toward the final victory of the great country of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Rungna Islet Takes on New Look
articles.content:
Rungna Islet Takes on New Look
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Rungna Islet is situated in the River Taedong flowing across the heart of the capital city of Pyongyang.
					 The islet has been famous for groves of weeping willow in its margin.
					
					 It boasts of May Day Stadium and Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					 The stadium was the venue of the opening ceremony of the 13th World Festival of Youth and Students in 1989.
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" has taken place in the stadium in recent years.
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Park consists of dolphinarium, wading pool, fun fair, mini golf course, etc.
					
					 The wading pool, at the entrance of the pleasure park, includes 10-meter-high diving tower, water slides and shower bath.
					
					 In the dolphinarium, people can enjoy various feats of dolphins.
					
					 More than 3 500 people visit the dolphinarium each day.
					
					 Installed in the fun fair were rotary hawk, merry-go-round, free fall, mad mouse, etc. 
					
					 Pak Song Un, a student at Kim Chaek University of Technology, after enjoying the spaceship, said that he wants to become a space scientist so as to contribute to developing the nation's space science.
					
					 The pleasure park is associated with respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's deep concern for public entertainment.

articles.title: Youngsters in Pyongyang Hold Story-telling Meeting
articles.content:
Youngsters in Pyongyang Hold Story-telling Meeting 
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A story-telling meeting of youth and students took place at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 The meeting began with poem "Long live the great Songun politics!" 
					
					 The performers highly praised the feats Kim Jong Il performed by laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the nation. 
					
					 Stories, dialogic poem and song "Whenever We Recall the Way of Songun" expressing ardent yearnings and reverence for Kim Jong Il helped the participants deeply cherish the belief that he is immortal as the sun of Songun of Juche Korea. 
					
					 The performers expressed their firm resolution to glorify the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il for all ages and single-mindedly follow the dear respected Kim Jong Un along the long way of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: People in Kangryong Vow to Bury Enemy at Sea through Army-People Unity
articles.content:
People in Kangryong Vow to Bury Enemy at Sea through Army-People Unity
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The news that Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un inspected the island defence detachments in the most hotbed of the southernmost part of the southwest front has stirred up the whole land of Kangryong.
					 The people in Kangryong County actively assisted the service personnel of the Korean People's Army sharing the thought with them whenever there occurred clashes in the West Sea including the Yonphyong Island shelling case. They are now refreshing the resolution to mercilessly wipe out the enemy true to the order of the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Choe Jong Muk, chief secretary of the Kangryong County Party Committee of South Hwanghae Province, said that mad bandits are going reckless, not coming to their senses after the Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 The people in the county are full of the spirit of annihilating the enemy true to the order given by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises on August 20. This shows that they remain unchanged in their nature of aggression.
					
					 There are service personnel of the KPA on Jangjae Islet and Mu Islet and the people of Kangryong behind them. No force on earth can match the might of the great unity of the army and people rallied close around Kim Jong Un, the illustrious commander.
					
					 If even a bullet is dropped in the sea off Yonphyong Island, we, together with the KPA, will blow up the den of the enemy and lead it to a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 So Myong Sok, manager of the Phyonghwa Shallow-sea Culture Station, hardly repressing excitement upon hearing the news of the inspection of the Supreme Commander, noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Un inspected the island defence detachments aboard a small wooden boat. I felt tears trickling down, seeing on TV him having a talk with officials who accompanied him with a broad smile on his face on the wooden boat. All of us were full of conviction of sure victory.
					
					 We will positively aid the army, bearing deep in mind the kind and meticulous loving care shown by the Supreme Commander for service personnel. 
					
					 If the enemies start a war, we will join the soldiers to bury them in the waters of the West Sea.
					
					 Kim Kwang Hun, manager of the Kangryong County Food Administration Station, said that his employees brought about a surge in production with the feelings of carrying shells to the front at the time of the Yonphyong Island shelling, adding that they would more energetically assist the soldiers with the will of annihilating the enemy.
					
					 Kang Chun Ok residing in the township of the county said in the excited tones:
					
					 I could not sleep even a wink the whole night after hearing that Marshal Kim Jong Un visited the Jangjae and Mu Islets which are quite near the enemy's base.
					
					 I was deeply touched to see Kim Jong Un smiling with a six-month-old baby in his arms.
					
					 All people of the county are crying from the bottom of their hearts.
					
					 Standing in the forefront line is Kim Jong Un, the illustrious commander. All service personnel and people will annihilate the enemy with the same faith and pluck as displayed by the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Joint Statement of DPRK Organizations Fully Supported
articles.content:
Joint Statement of DPRK Organizations Fully Supported
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean puppet regime have launched joint military exercises, codenamed Ulji Freedom Guardian, against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, bringing the situation of the Korean peninsula to a touch-and-go phase. 
					 Not long ago, they had attempted to carry out terrorist acts to demolish statues in the DPRK, which suffered failure.
					
					 Choe Ryong, an official of the Pothonggang District, Pyongyang City, Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers will be sorry for  the war exercises they kicked off against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK servicepersons and civilians fully support the joint statement of the DPRK organizations, declaring that the DPRK is ready to wage a nationwide sacred war against the warmongers and achieve national reunification, if they dare provoke it.
					
					 They should be well aware of the fact that it is a disposition of the DPRK to return fire for fire."

articles.title: DPRK Scores Economic Achievements
articles.content:
DPRK Scores Economic Achievements
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Inspired by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's order of a great war for national reunification, working people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are registering big achievements in economic sectors.
					 Miners of the Kumgol Mine under the Komdok Mining Complex have overfulfilled their daily ore-transport plan at 130 percent, paving the way for hitting the yearly target.
					
					 They are now buckling down to providing sites favorable for coal cutting within August.
					
					 Coal mines in Sunchon, Tokchon, Pukchang and other areas are doubling their efforts to boost the coal production.
					
					 The Rakwon Machine Complex is increasing the production of excavators and some of the weavers in the Sariwon Textile Mill have already fulfilled their yearly or two-year assignments.
					
					 The 618 Construction Shock Brigade is pressing ahead with the construction of dwelling houses and public buildings in the Kosan Fruit Farm at the final stage.
					
					 The agricultural workers across the country are cutting 600 000 tonnes of grass for manure on daily average.

articles.title: Spokesman for Korean Anti-Nuke Peace Committee Terms U.S. Arch Nuclear Criminal
articles.content:
Spokesman for Korean Anti-Nuke Peace Committee Terms U.S. Arch Nuclear Criminal 
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The report "Radioactive warfare" worked out by the FBI on April 20, 1951 has been recently discovered. According to it, much upset by the stalemate in its war of aggression, the U.S. sought to create a "non-man area" not allowing access to anyone by spraying a huge quantity of radioactive materials including plutonium and nuclear waste in the area dividing the Korean Peninsula. Then it let the Atomic Energy Committee examine and confirm its possibility. It conducted field test on the warfare 65 times till 1952 in the nuclear test ground in Utah State.
					 A spokesman for the Korean Anti-Nuke Peace Committee in a statement on Friday termed the U.S. arch nuclear criminal.
					
					 The U.S. tried to use A-bombs to recover from its repeated setbacks in the battles during the Korean War. This fact is still fresh in the memory of the world people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					  The recent disclosure of the U.S. horrible scenario clearly proved once again that the U.S. imperialists are brutes without an equal and arch nuclear criminals who do not hesitate to exterminate a nation and reduce its cradle to a permanent wasteland for the purpose of realizing their ambition for aggression.
					
					  The report of the FBI called for keeping open the possibility for discussion on the use of nuclear materials in the future, too, not completely abandoning it. This indicates that the U.S. is working hard to carry out its scenario any time.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers are part of this scenario.
					
					 The U.S. is trumpeting about "a nuclear threat" from the DPRK while concealing its gruesome nuclear scenario. This shows what shameless hypocrite the U.S. is.
					
					 The world knows no such group of wicked traitors as the south Korean puppet group which is kicking up a nuclear racket against the DPRK over its nuclear deterrent for protecting the nation while shutting its eyes to the U.S hideous nuclear scenario to exterminate it.
					
					 Nukes should be put under control in kind.
					
					 The DPRK expects the fair public of the world will pay due attention to the U.S. criminal scenario and strongly stand up against it.

articles.title: Korean Youth Volunteer to Join or Rejoin KPA
articles.content:
Korean Youth Volunteer to Join or Rejoin KPA
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the order given by Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un, young people in the DPRK volunteer to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army to wipe out enemies. 
					 Ringing out from every worksite are loud voices of youth evincing their resolution to fully display the heroic spirit of the Korean youth in the sacred battle fields, holding arms in their hands. 
					
					 Hong Kwang Ryong, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, declared that all youth of the country would mete out a merciless punishment to the U.S imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime with arms of the revolution. 
					
					 Kim Ji Yong, farmer of the Jangsan Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County, said, proud of becoming a soldier standing guard over the post for defending the country as he desired: 
					
					 "We have waited for the day we will don uniforms of the revolution and turn out to wipe out the U.S imperialists and the rat-like Myung Bak group, the foes of reunification and root cause of the confrontation with compatriots. We are filled with the will and determination to mercilessly wipe out the enemies who dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK." 
					
					 Similar voices of young people are heard from Cholsan Hill of the Musan Mining Complex. 
					
					 "It is the unique mettle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to counter the enemies' provocation with a severe punishment and react to a war with a fierce retaliatory war", young people from there stated, adding "All service personnel and people will blow up at one strike the citadel of the enemy through a merciless all-people sacred war."
					
					 Among the young people who volunteered to join the KPA in hearty response to the order of the Supreme Commander were many officials of the Tongdaewon District Committee of Pyongyang City of the youth league, young people from the Taedonggang Power Station, the Ryongchon Co-op Farm in Samchon County and other organs, industrial establishments and farms across the country.

articles.title: Preparations for 26th Pyongyang Int'l Table-Tennis Tournament Finished
articles.content:
Preparations for 26th Pyongyang Int'l Table-Tennis Tournament Finished
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is ready for hosting the 26th Pyongyang International Invitation Table-Tennis Tournament.
					 The tournament will take place at the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here from August 27 to 31. 
					
					 Posters of the tournament to be held in the idea of independence, friendship and peace are seen in streets of Pyongyang.
					
					 It will be attended by paddlers from the DPRK, China, Norway, New Zealand and Denmark. 
					
					 The first tournament was held in Juche 70 (1981).

articles.title: Truth behind Ukishima-maru ExplosionDPRK Order Awarded to Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Truth behind Ukishima-maru Explosion
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A Japanese naval transport ship Ukishima-maru was sunk by explosion in the sea off Maizuru Port of Japan on August 24, 1945.
					 The sinking killed thousands of Koreans who were aboard the ship to return home upon the liberation of Korea from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 After the incident, the Japanese reactionaries insisted that it was exploded by a mine laid by the U.S. army, but it was a lie.
					
					 According to testimonies of witnesses, including Japanese people, Ukishima-maru that left Ominato Port headed for Maizuru, not for Pusan of Korea.
					
					 It was disclosed that the ship was not loaded with fuel enough to go to Pusan. This proved that the ship was not due to go to Pusan.
					
					 Worse still, Japanese people, informed of the planned explosion beforehand, hurriedly escaped the ship by boats prior to the explosion, leaving Koreans only on the ship, 
					
					 These facts illustrate that the incident was a planned massacre of Koreans, which was manipulated by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 The Korean feature film "Souls Protest" gives a vivid representation of the massacre.

articles.title: DPRK Order Awarded to Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Iranian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Order of DPRK Friendship Second Class was awarded to Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK.
					 It was in recognition of the firm support and solidarity he has shown for the just cause of the Korean people for the building of a thriving socialist nation and national reunification and his contribution to boosting the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and staff members of the Iranian embassy.

articles.title: Korean People Will Never Pardon Japan's Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean People Will Never Pardon Japan's Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a bylined article to the 67th anniversary of the explosion of "Ukishima-maru" in which the defeated Japanese imperialists buried at sea a great number of Koreans heading for home with joy of the country's liberation.
					 The explosion was a premeditated and deliberate massacre perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists consistent with their policy to exterminate the Korean nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries tried to avenge their defeat by killing more Koreans. So, they orchestrated the unprecedented case. They schemed to keep the case in mystery, claiming that it was "an inevitable accident" by a mine. The Japanese government refused to confirm the number of the dead by the explosion and their names and addresses and even opened to the public the much diminished death toll. The case is an unpardonable crime against humanity in view of international law and humanitarianism and in the light of the reason why Koreans were taken to Japan.
					
					 Japan's history since then has been characterized by moves to stage a comeback to Korea. Japan seeks to exterminate Koreans before anything else in a bid to put Asia under its control and realize the "greater east Asia co-prosperity sphere." This is its invariable guidelines for aggression.
					
					 The Korean people can and will never forget the crime-woven history of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They will never pardon the crimes Japan committed by forcibly drafting millions of Koreans to exploit them and massively killing many of them after its defeat.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Should Behave with Discretion: Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Should Behave with Discretion: Koreans in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement on August 21 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The military drills now under way under the pretext of "annual defence exercises" target the supreme leadership of the DPRK and envisage preemptive attacks on its strategic bases. This amounts to the declaration of a war as they clearly indicate the intention to invade the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The prevailing serious situation clearly shows who is the chieftain destroying and wrecking the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, the root cause of a war and provocateur.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime are made up of matchless war maniacs as they are set to fire bullets and shells on the people of the DPRK who suffered from severe flood damage. 
					
					 The association urges them to behave with discretion, clearly mindful that those who are fond of playing with fire are destined to perish.

articles.title: Magazine Paektu-Halla Published by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Magazine Paektu-Halla Published by Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China brought out the Aug. issue of Paektu-Halla, its magazine.
					 The magazine carries a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un waving back to the cheering war veterans, when taking a photo session with them who took part in the celebrations of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It spotlights the decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Given in the magazine is an account of the rally held by the association to congratulate him on receiving the title.
					
					 It carries the full text of the congratulatory message he sent to the participants in the meeting of officials of chapters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 It runs news that the association and its affiliated bodies held meetings to remember President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 Conveyed in the magazine is news that floral baskets and bunches of flowers were laid before the statue of the President in Jilin Yuwen High School and his portrait in the Dandong branch of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on the occasion.
					
					 It carries articles headed "General and CNC (7)", "Chairman of NDC Kim Jong Il's Personality as Great Man", "On the 67th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation" and "Long Live Undying Victory in Fatherland Liberation War!" and poem "Oh, Our August 15".
					
					 It gives accounts of a joint forum of Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to mark the 40th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement and the round-table talks with war veterans who fought in the Korean front as members of the Chinese People's Volunteers on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It also runs a statement issued by a spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea condemning the moves to ink a military agreement between south Korea and Japan.
					
					 It says that the association and the bodies under it released statements denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for suppressing the vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and resorting to subversive and sabotage actions against the DPRK in collaboration with the U.S. 
					
					 It notes that south Korean social bodies grouping people from all walks of life started an all-people signature campaign for checking the conclusion of the agreement.

articles.title: DPRK Will Show Provocateurs What Real War Will Be Like: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Show Provocateurs What Real War Will Be Like: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are staging the madcap Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises despite the strong protest and denunciation of the public at home and abroad. Meanwhile, they are drastically increasing the hours of flight and frequency of operations of high-altitude strategic reconnaissance planes and intensifying espionage against the DPRK in the West Sea of Korea and in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line by setting in motion anti-artillery radars, drones and other reconnaissance means.
					 Minju Joson Friday in a bylined commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This clearly shows what a dangerous phase their moves to ignite a war against the DPRK have reached.
					
					 Their description of the saber-rattling as the "last drill under 'OPLAN 5027'" is just hypocrisy.
					
					 What they seek is to make the public convince that they would not unleash a war against the DPRK so as to slacken its vigilance. And then by availing themselves of this opportunity, they are going to start a war.
					
					 They are working hard to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms. But it is just illusion.
					
					 If even a single bullet is dropped in any area where the DPRK's sovereignty is exercised, it will give the fullest play to the war deterrent it has built up so far and show the provocateurs the real power of arms and war and achieve the historic cause of national reunification. This is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The time is approaching fast when the war provocateurs will meet the shower of fire for their provocation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Internet Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Internet Website of Swiss Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Intensify the Anti-Imperialist, Anti-U.S. Struggle" was posted on the Internet website of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on August 14.
					 The work made public on August 12, 1967 specifies the necessity of the uninterrupted struggle against imperialism and the U.S. and the position and role of the struggle against imperialism and colonialism in the development of the world revolution.
					
					 It also indicates the main strategy of the world revolution and ways for carrying it out.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous County" was carried by foreign papers and posted on foreign websites between August 15 and 17.
					 They were the Bangladeshi paper Natun Bangla, the Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya and websites of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea and the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The work made public on July 26, 2012 clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by his ardent love for the country and the people.
					
					 The work specifies important issues in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries to celebrate the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership between August 13 and 16.
					 They were meetings and photo exhibitions hosted by the Litomerice County Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran, lectures by the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement and the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Company of Indonesia and a film show by a company of Singapore. 
					
					 Displayed at the photo exhibition halls were photos on the Songun leadership exploits made by Kim Jong Il as well as those showing achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The chief secretary of the Litomerice County Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said in his speech President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il made great contributions to developing the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran said the DPRK could make progress thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il who led the army and people to victory. 
					
					 The Songun politics has been carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the president said, sincerely hoping the Korean people would give spurs to building a thriving nation under his leadership, meeting the challenges of the imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said in his lecture that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding and experienced state leader, adding his Songun leadership brought a new era of building a thriving nation to the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Media Give Publicity to Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Media Give Publicity to Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and Internet websites of different countries introduced the exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il on the 52nd anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The August 15th issue of the Iranian paper Iran News carried the photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Immortal exploits of Songun" said that Kim Jong Il made a long journey of Songun for half a century, turning the DPRK into an invincible political and military power and laying a solid foundation for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il has been successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, stressed the paper.
					
					 The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on Aug. 15 said thanks to the Songun politics the independent dignity of the Korean people has remarkable increased, the DPRK further developed into an invincible power which no force dares provoke and a signal phase for national reunification has been provided.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Ekota on Aug. 14 said that thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership the Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army and socialist Korea has covered only the road of victory.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Aug. 8 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Songun Korea".

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Publishes Bulletin "Songun Korea"
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Publishes Bulletin "Songun Korea"
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee published its bulletin on Aug. 16 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Songun Korea" quoted a congratulatory speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in April this year at the military parade to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, as saying:
					
					 "The geopolitical position of the DPRK has not changed but the formerly weak and small country which was a theatre of struggle by big powers has now turned into a dignified political and military power, and the Korean people are demonstrating their dignity as an independent people that no force dares provoke.
					
					 This signal event in the destiny of the Korean nation was not just the accidental results of the times but historic inevitability brought about by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who were pioneers and leaders of Songun revolution."
					
					 The history of the distressed Korean nation came to an end by President Kim Il Sung, pioneer of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The cause of Songun started by Kim Il Sung was successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There is in the DPRK today Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The international community was assured of Kim Jong Un's firm will of Songun in his speech "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" at the military parade in April 2012.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Opposes U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Opposes U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation (ATUF) sent letters to the U.S. and the south Korean ambassadors in Vienna on Aug. 20 in protest against the provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers against the DPRK. The letters said:
					 The ATUF Left Bloc denounces UFG for infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and extremely straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. threatens the DPRK and, at the same time, brings dark clouds of a war in a bid to hold political and military hegemony on the whole Korean Peninsula, the letters noted.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately stop its provocative war maneuvers, conclude a peace agreement with the DPRK and pull the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces out of south Korea at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona compania Kamnamu de unidad 4302
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona compania Kamnamu de unidad 4302
						
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la compania Kamnamu (caqui) de la unidad 4302 del EPC que recibio 3 veces el titulo de Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones.
					  Le acogieron en el terreno los comandantes de la unidad y la compania.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo dio como recuerdo a las militares de la compania los binoculos y fusil automatico y se retrato con ellas expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que defenderan la patria socialista como bastion de acero.
					
					  Guiado por los comandantes, recorrio el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Acto seguido, el recorrio la sala de educacion, el cuartel y el comedor.
					
					  Me pongo emocionado cuando escucho la palabra compania Kamnamu, registrada en la historia de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun como lugar con muchos episodios del amor por los soldados del Dirigente, dijo y agrego que por eso, todo el pais y todo el mundo la conocen.
					
					  Quedarian ya pocas militares que se habian reunido con el Dirigente, pero, aunque cambien las generaciones, no se deben cambiar jamas el espiritu y la tradicion de la compania, apunto.
					
					  Instruyo glorificar de generacion en generacion las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente registradas en la compania.
					
					  Se mostro satisfecho al saber que las mesas de la sala de educacion se usan durante varias decadas desde el dia en que la compania fue visitada por el Presidente.
					
					  En el dormitorio, estuvo en el punto donde se habian sentado el Presidente y el Dirigente y examino la calidad de frazadas.
					
					  Escucho en el bano el metodo de sauna y bano que se hace con el canamo silvestre.
					
					  En el comedor, pregunto si se suministran los alimentos como norma diaria y si hace falta algo y subrayo que se debe alimentar a las soldados segun la norma. 
					
					  Al ver en la cocina el cambaro entre las comidas a cocinar, averiguo detalladamente donde fue capturado y como se cocina y pregunto cual plato les gusta mas a las militares.
					
					  Ese dia, el recorrio la salina que usa la compania para el autoabastecimiento.
					
					  En su recorrido por la posicion de fuego artillero, se informo como la compania cumple su mision de combate.
					
					  Dio valiosas instrucciones viendo la posicion de fuego, los equipos tecnicos de combate y las construcciones de defensa donde estuvieron el Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					  Dijo que se debe glorificar para siempre las hazanas de los Generalisimos al lograr sin falta la reunificacion de la patria uniendo las fuerzas entre el Comandante Supremo y militares.
					
					Continuo que el confia en los uniformados del frente oriental, en particular, en las militares de la compania, las revolucionarias que defienden un puesto de ese frente.
					
					  Caminando por el sendero del puesto, averiguo la cantidad de caqui cosechado en el ano pasado y prometio volver cuando este madurada esa fruta.
					
					  Seguidamente, vio la funcion artistica de las militares de la compania.
					
					  Ellas presentaron diversas piezas como el coro "Marcha de jovenes coreanos", la narracion y cancion "General y nuestra compania Kamnamu", el solo femenino y pangchang "No tiene fin la anoranza", el sexteto "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y la poesia y coro "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un".
					
					  El Comandante Supremo envio fuertes aplausos felicitando el exito de la funcion.
					
					  Luego, sostuvo conversaciones con las militares de la compania.
					
					  Dijo que ellas deben servir de ejemplo de todo el ejercito al realizar bien los preparativos de combate y las actividades de grupo artistico e indico que no deben relajar la disposicion de combate y seguir de cerca los movimientos de los enemigos que libran ahora los imprudentes ejercicios de la guerra de agresion.
					
					Dio la indicacion de ahogar implacablemente en el mar si alguno de los enemigos se atreve a invadir.
					
					  Al ver a las militares que lamentaban la separacion, llamo a su lado a cada una de ellas para retratarse.
					
					Pensando en la ausencia de la jefa y la instructora politica de la compania, prometio volver sin falta a la compania para tomar fotos con ellas.

articles.title: Erguidas en MINFAP estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Erguidas en MINFAP estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25 de Agosto en que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il iniciara la orientacion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, quedaron erguidas en el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					Esto es un magno evento que demuestra fehacientemente la invariable voluntad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa del Sol enalteciendo para siempre a los generales del monte Paektu y que permitio realizar el mayor deseo de los oficiales y los soldados del EPC.
					
					Las estatuas describen la imagen del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien poniendo las dos manos en la cintura, sonrie  ampliamente y la otra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien previendo el radiante futuro del nuevo siglo bendice el camino a seguir por la Corea del Songun a ser prospera.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 24 la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Chol Hae, O Kuk Ryol, los funcionarios directivos del MINFAP, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, familiares de los militares, los funcionarios y empleados de las unidades que hicieron contribucion a la construccion de las estatuas junto con los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Los funcionarios directivos del partido y el ejercito hicieron descubrimiento de las estatuas.
					
					Una vez descubiertas, las estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, invencible bandera y simbolo de la victoria y gloria de Corea del Songun, lanzaron sus brillos.
					
					Ante ellas  fue depositado un cesto de flores en nombre del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ademas, fueron colocados los otros en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el otro del Estado Mayor General y la Direccion Politica General, del EPC y del MINFAP.
					
					Tambien, fueron depositados centenares de cestos de flores en nombre de las unidades y subunidades del EPC a todos los niveles, las academias militares y las unidades dirigidas sobre el terreno por los Generales del monte Paektu.
					
					Los participantes les rindieron sublime homenaje.
					
					El discurso de descurimiento estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador alabo las inmortales hazanas de los grandes Generalisimos quienes convirtieron a Corea en la potencia militar de talla mundial dispuesta del poderio militar incomparable y en el digno pais con armas nucleares.
					
					Subrayo que el evento de hoy se debe a la noble obligacion moral y la destacada direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					En reflejo de la infinita veneracion de todo el ejercito y el pueblo del pais, rindio el mas sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos y la maxima gloria y el caluroso agradecimiento al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien escribe nueva pagina de la sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun de Juche.

articles.title: Acto central por 52o aniversario de inicio de la guia del Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 52o aniversario de inicio de la guia del Songun de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 52o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar). 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion junto con trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Gak, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					
					El 25 de agosto de 1960, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio en el terreno la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC lo cual significo la declaracion solemne de la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun, senalo el informante y continuo: 
					
					Durante medio siglo desde que comenzara su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun en acato al noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente realizo las hazanas inmortales ante la epoca y la revolucion, la patria y la humanidad superando al frente las severas dificultades de la historia con su destacada idea y extraordinaria direccion. 
					
					Cuando la revolucion coreana atravesaba las peores pruebas, formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo con su larga prevision y extraordinaria clarividencia y la practico generalmente.
					
					Oriento el trabajo y las actividades del partido a materializar la linea de la revolucion del Songun e hizo establecer en toda la sociedad el clima de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas y asuntos militares y el sistema de aparatos estatales al estilo coreano con el Comite de Defensa Nacional como su eje.
					
					Esto fue acontecimiento especial que preparo la garantia politica e institucional de la implementacion de la politica de Songun.
					
					Convirtio el Ejercito Popular de Corea en las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y elevo la posicion de la patria a la de potencia militar de talla mundial y digno poseedor de armas nucleares.
					
					　Gracias a tal orientacion del Dirigente, el EPC pudo crecer como ejercito de flor y nata dispuesto a defender a costa de la vida al lider y la industria de defensa nacional de Corea se desarrollo como la capaz de fabricar cualquier arma sofisticada.
					
					  Al preparar las filas del EPC como colectivo de camaradas que comparten el destino con el Comandante Supremo y unificar la idea y el modo de lucha de los militares y civiles, consolido la cohesion de las filas de la revolucion como la unidad monolitica entre el lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					En todo el ejercito se lograron con exito la unidad entre los oficiales y soldados y la combinacion de los asuntos militares y los politicos mientras en toda la sociedad se fomenta la union entre militares y civiles.
					
					La unidad monolitica fortalecida en tales circunstancias es el patrimonio y orgullo mas grandes del pueblo coreano.
					
					Ya en el periodo de la Marcha penosa, la forzada, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento el magno proyecto de construir un Estado prospero e hizo que el EPC jugara el papel de vanguardia en los importantes sectores de la construccion socialista y todo el pueblo aprendiera el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, de modo que se levantara en todo el pais la ola de grandes innovaciones y saltos.
					
					En el camino de su direccion en el terreno caracterizada por el amor por la patria y el pueblo, se registraron sucesivamente los acontecimientos sin precedentes en la historia de cinco milenios de la nacion coreana.
					
					Vuela en el espacio el satelite artificial, funciona un gran numero de las maquinas hechas con la tecnologia CNC, se establecieron autoctonos sistemas de produccion, se levantaron por doquier creaciones monumentales y ejemplares del siglo 20 y se abrio la nueva era de florecimiento de la cultura socialista.
					
					La orientacion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y su politica de igual nombre permitieron el nacimiento de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, documentos que encarnan el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Ademas, dieron la nueva coyuntura en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, defendieron firmemente la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y promovieron energicamente la causa de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Hoy dia, la autoctona causa revolucionaria del Songun avanza firmemente gracias al Mariscal     Kim Jong Un.
					
					Apoyando con fidelidad la guia del Songun del Mariscal, debemos levantar en suelo patrio un Estado prospero socialista y lograr la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Todos los militantes del PTC, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y habitantes deben tener al Mariscal como centro de unidad y direccion, defenderlo a costa de la vida en lo politico e ideologico y en cualesquier circunstancias adversas y unirse monoliticamente en torno a el.
					
					Ahora nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias se mantienen en la disposicion de combate decisivo en sus trincheras frente a las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos para desatar la guerra de agresion.
					
					Si los enemigos lanzan un solo obus a nuestro territorio jurisdiccional, todos nuestros militares y civiles, que recibieron ya la orden del Comandante Supremo, no perderan esa oportunidad de oro, pasaran inmediatamente al contraataque demoledor y lo ampliaran a la sagrada guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Pintoresco islote Rungna de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Pintoresco islote Rungna de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El islote Rungna es un lugar pintoresco de esta capital.
					Alli esta enclavado el Estadio Primero de Mayo, donde en 1989 se encendio la antorcha del XIII Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes y en estos dias, se desarrolla la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang".
					
					En el islote, testimonio del gigantesco cambio de la capital, fue levantado el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna de talla mundial que cuenta con el acuario de delfines, la piscina, el lugar de recreo y la cancha de mini-golf y otros.
					
					Los lugares de descanso estan divididos por areas verdes.
					
					Tanto los coreanos como numerosos extranjeros y compatriotas en el ultramar visitan al parque de atracciones.
					
					Segun un funcionario del parque, mas de 3 mil 500 personas como promedio al dia visitan al acuario de delfines y mas de 10 mil al luego de recreo.
					
					Entrevistado con la ACNC en el parque de atraccion, el estudiante de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Pak Song Un (22 anos de edad) expuso su decision de ser el conquistador de cosmos con la elevada ciencia y tecnica para responder con fidelidad a la benevolencia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien escribe la historia de amor por el pueblo.
					
					Los visitantes, tras disfrutar de los aparatos de atraccion, van a las refresquerias o recorren el recinto del parque tomando el tren de turismo.
					
					El Parque, que transmite el amor del Mariscal   Kim Jong Un por el pueblo, estimula energicamente a este a construir un Estado prospero.
